closed_chat.description: Jesvi from ICICI merchant (Username: 136629) is unable to log in to WebGUI. The system returns an "Invalid Credentials" error.
closed_chat.subject: WebGUI Login Issue - Invalid Credentials
closed_chat.summary: ICICI merchant user (Jesvi, Username: 136629) is experiencing a login issue with WebGUI due to invalid credentials.
closed_chat.analysis: The issue could be due to an incorrect password, a locked account, or a temporary system glitch.  A password reset, account unlock, or checking for system-wide issues on WebGUI could resolve the problem.
closed_chat.reply: Thank you for the information. A ticket has been created. We'll investigate the issue and get back to you as soon as possible.
